title: Emma Terho on why she nearly left ice hockey and snowboarder Tessa Maud from Lausanne 2020
description: After one of her biggest achievements, Olympic bronze medallist Emma Terho of Finland nearly left her sport. She explained why she decided to continue at her talk at the Chat with Champions event. Plus, find out why US halfpipe snowboarder Tessa Maud is excited to get started at the Winter Youth Olympic Games.
